The Impact Measurement Breakfasts are part of Convergences’ mission: to bring together stakeholders from different sectors around a shared desire to respond concretely to sustainable development issues. The needs related to social and environmental impact measurement for the ecosystem and the relevance of conducting collective and decompartmentalized reflections have thus led Convergences to organize these series of meetings.

The purpose of the Impact Measurement Breakfasts is to advance knowledge in the field of social and environmental impact measurement, and to provide practical tools to professionals. They meet 3 to 4 times a year.

Each year, the process is accompanied by structures specialized or involved in this field. They contribute to the preparation, animation and follow-up of the meetings, and participate in guaranteeing the quality of the process and of the resulting deliverable.

Since 2019, the PDMI are co-animated by Avise and Improve:
